page.title: 18Mrs Taylor's day ii
page.content: The family have a cooked tea at about{5.30pm}and then a snack in the evening. She and her husband always watch the{nine o'clock news}and go to bed at about{11.00 pm. She can drive herself to{Shaftesbury for some shopping but she rarely goes out of Tollard Royal because she can get all her everyday food from the village shop, such as{bacon, bread and {cheese. Every three weeks her husband does a large shop at{Verwood}and fills up the freezer. As well as housework, shopping and cooking for her family she helps keep the church clean, and does cleaning in other people's houses. Every{Wednesday she visits her parents at{Farnham.}She finds Tollard Royal a friendly village where people help those who need it. {(AUTHORS: )
